title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Spending in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 4 data points.
Overall Spending in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Spending in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2015 to 2020.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2020.
Max Spending in million U.S. dollars about 1220.0 was recorded at Year 2020
Min Spending in million U.S. dollars about 230.0 was recorded at Year 2015
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Spending in million U.S. dollars with a total of 4 data points. The chart has one significant trend.
This trend is increasing which exists from 2020 to 2015.
